tool_description: Inserts selected clauses into contract templates at optimal positions while maintaining document structure and formatting.

contract_content.description: Original contract text where clauses will be inserted

clause_ids.description: List of clause IDs to insert into the contract

insertion_positions.description: Specific positions for manual insertion mode

preserve_formatting.description: Whether to maintain original document formatting

add_headers.description: Whether to add section headers for inserted clauses

error_messages: Empty contract content: Cannot insert clauses into empty contract
No clauses specified: Provide at least one clause_id to insert
Clause not found: One or more specified clause_ids do not exist
Invalid insertion mode: Must be 'auto', 'manual', or 'suggested'
Position mismatch: Number of insertion_positions must match number of clauses for manual mode
Invalid numbering style: Must be 'decimal', 'roman', 'alpha', or 'none'
usage: Provide contract_content and clause_ids. Use insertion_mode and insertion_positions to control placement. Adjust formatting options as needed.

insertion_summary.description: Summary of clauses inserted and positions

clause_positions.description: Final positions where each clause was inserted

word_count_change.description: Change in document word count after insertion
